She has had her business for over six years, using some saving she had, she started her business. She will use the profits invest in building expenses since she started building her house. She is thankful for the loans and she is in wonder of sharing her life that has been improved.  She is reaching her goals and with God, this loan opportunity, and her business all of her dreams come true. Thanks for your support!

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Ramona De La Concepcion

texts.es: Ramona es una persona muy responsable, esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Ella se dedica a la venta de comenticos, desde hace más de 12 años, que trabaja en este medio de vida. Dio inicio por cuenta propia ya que la necesidad mantener a su familia la ha obligado a salir adelante.  Este crédito que solicita es para la compra de lápiz labial, perfumes, cremas, pinturas entre otras cosas que sus clientes le han solicitado ella es una persona que ha sabido satisfacer la demanda de productos que sus clientes le solicitan. Sueña con incrementar su negocio cada día más.
texts.en:
Ramona is a very responsible woman, and this is not the first time that she has had a loan. She has sold cosmetics for more than twelve years so has lots of experience in the field. She started her own business as she needed to support her family and make progress in life. 

The loan she is seeking will be used to buy the lipsticks, perfume, lotions, makeup etc. that her customers have asked for. Ramona is a person who knows that it is important to satisfy her customers’ requests. Her dream is to see her business grow.

loans.use: to buy beauty products

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 45 años, vive con su esposo  y sus dos hijas en su casa que es propia.Esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la enseñanza de danzas a niños de  de dos a seis años. Además se dedica al comercio de útiles escolares y  otros  accesorios de librería en su vivienda, también vende productos de belleza, que le permiten captar adicionales ganancias. El negocio que posee, lo ha  implementado de a pocos, y le va muy bien a pesar que recién hace un año instaló su negocio, sin embargo,  ya tiene muchos clientes quienes acuden a su negocio por su buen trato y amabilidad. En ocasiones que sale de compras, su hija la apoya en la atención de su librería y como es una mujer emprendedora para más adelante anhela comprarse una vitrina para mejorar su tienda.Es el  sexto préstamo que tiene con MFP, y se siente agradecido por todo el apoyo que recibe, y además esta muy contenta de pertenecer a su grupo, por ello promete pagar  puntualmente sus cuotas.Martha tiene planeado invertir el  dinero del crédito solicitado en la compra de mayor cantidad de útiles escolares, para mejorar su negocio y espera así aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
45-year old Martha lives with her husband and two daughters in their own home. She is an enterprising woman who earns her living teaching dance to children aged 2-7 years. She also sells school supplies and other stationery items, as well as beauty products, from a store in her house. This allows her to earn additional income. The business has grown gradually and is doing well even though she only started it a year ago. She already has many customers who come to her because of the good service and friendly treatment they receive. When Martha has to go out to buy stock, her daughter looks after the store. As she is a go-ahead person, she wishes to buy a display cabinet to improve the store. 

This is the sixth loan that Martha has had with Kiva partner MFP, and she is grateful for all the support she has received. She is very happy to belong to this group and promises to make repayments on the loan according to the schedule. She plans to use the money to buy more school supplies and thus improve her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for her business

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SUMAC WATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marina; ella tiene 56 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de fruta, ella vende en el mercado de SanSebastian, ella vende diferentes variedad de fruta como manzanas, naranjas, platanos, uvas y naranjas, ella tiene un pequeño puesto donde atiende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de fruta. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar fruta al por mayor.  
                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marina belongs to the Sumac Wata Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Marina is a 56 year old widow, and she has four children.  She alternates her daily activity with her business of selling fruit.  She sells at the San Sebastian market.  She sells different varieties of fruit like apples, oranges, bananas, and grapes.  She has a small stand where she sells from 7:00 a.m until 6:00 p.m.

She wants to expand her fruit selling business.  She is requesting the loan to buy fruit wholesale.  She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy fruit wholesale

loans.name: Sonia Cayetana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SUMAC WATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sonia Cayetana; ella tiene 47 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa y también se dedica a trabajar en un hotel, la socia vende ropa en forma independiente y ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, chompas, polos y blusas al por mayor.                                  

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member who belongs to the communal bank named "Sumac Wata". It is located in the district, province and region of Cusco. 

Her name is Sonia Cayetana. She is 47 years old, she is married, and she has 2 children. She sells clothing for a business and she also is employed in a hotel. She sells clothing merchandise independently and she travels to make her sales. She wants to expand and improve her clothing business. She requests a loan to purchase items of clothing, such as pants, jackets, polo shirts, and blouses in wholesale.

She is happy to be in receipt of a loan and she is committed to the payment obligations.

loans.use: To purchase clothing merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Ansise Hispana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SUMAC WATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ansise Hispana; ella tiene 48 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de ferretería, ella atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de ferretería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería para la ferretería.                       
         
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member who belongs to the communal bank named "Sumac Wata". It is located in the district, province and region of Cusco. 

Her name is Mrs. Ansise Hispana. She is 48 years old, she is a widow, and she has 3 children. She has a hardware store which she operates from 8am until 7pm. She wishes to expand her hardware store. She requests a loan to purchase merchandise for her hardware store.

She is happy to be in receipt of a loan and she is committed to the payment obligations.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her hardware store.

loans.name: Senovia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SUMAC WATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Senovia; ella tiene 45 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas, ella vende en una tienda diferentes frutas como manzanas, naranjas, platanos entre otras frutas, la socia atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor.                              
 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member who belongs to the communal bank named "Sumac Wata". It is located in the district, province and region of Cusco.

Her name is Mrs. Senovia. She is 45 years old, she is married, and she has 3 children. She has a produce store. She has a store from where she sells a variety of fruits, such as apples, oranges, bananas, and others. She operates her business from 8am to 5pm. She wishes to expand her produce business. She requests a loan to purchase fruit in wholesale.

She is happy to be in receipt of a loan and she is committed to the payment obligations.

loans.use: To purchase fruit in wholesale.

loans.name: Ruth Vanessa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SUMAC WATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ruth Vanessa; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de fruta, ella vende en el mercado de San Sebastian, ella atiende desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de fruta. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas como manzanas, uvas, platanos, naranjas entre otras frutas.                             

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the “SUMAC WATA” communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The associate is Señora Ruth Vanessa.  She is 26 years of age and lives with her partner and child.  The associate alternates her daily activities with the fruit sale business.  She sells in the market of San Sebastian, where she attends her stall from 6:00 AM to 4:00 PM.  The associate wants to expand and improve her fruit sale business.  She requests a loan to buy fruits such as apples, grapes, plantains, and oranges, among other fruits.  

The associate is happy to receive the loan and she promises to comply with the payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy fruit to resell, such as apples, grapes, plantains, and oranges

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SUMAC WATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan; el tiene 58 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa para bebes, el socio también trabaja en el instituto nacional de cultura, el socio trabaja junto con su esposa vendiendo la ropa para bebes, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa para bebe. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa para bebes al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juan, 58, is a member of the “SUMAC WATA” communal bank located in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province and department.

He is married and has three children.  He alternates daily chores with the sale of baby clothes.  He also works at the National Institute of Culture.  He works together with his wife selling clothing for babies.  He wants to expand the baby clothes business.  He is asking for a loan to buy baby clothes at wholesale.

He is happy with the loan and promises to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy baby clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Silvia Elena

texts.es: Silvia Elena tiene 46 años, su actividad es la venta de mariscos, hace mas de 13 años, que tiene este negocio de manera ambulante ella siempre está buscando la manera de salir adelante. Tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo a quienes tiene que brindarles alimentos, vestimenta y educación. Inicio este medio de vida por una hermana ya que ella le enseño a ganarse este medio de vida. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de punches, jaibas, pescado, conchas, chuletas entre otros productos necesarios.
texts.en: Silvia Elena is 46 years old and she sells seafood. For more than 13 years she's had this business and she travels to make her sales. She's always in search for a way to get ahead. She has 3 young children in her care, needing to provide them with nutrition, clothing, and education. She started out when her sister taught her about the business. She requires a loan to purchase shrimp, crab, fish, oysters, and other products that she needs.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: the purchase of pants to sell.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna Isabel S. de 32 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos niños de 10 y 4 años de edad, por quienes trabaja muy duro para darles lo mejor. Ella reside en el departamento de San Salvador don vive junto a sus hijos, su hermano y una cuñada, con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar, lo que le ayuda mucho a Reyna ya que puede brindarles todo lo necesario a sus hijos. Reyna posee una tienda de productos de primera necesidad, en la cual invierte gran parte de su tiempo ya que es la única fuente de ingresos que posee, es por esto que ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir, comprando mayor cantidad de productos tanto alimenticios como de uso para el hogar, así de esta manera ella espera mejorar sus ganancias y salir adelante junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Reyna Isabel S. is 32 years old and she is a single mother of two children, aged 10 and 4. She works very hard to provide them only with the best. She lives together with her children, her brother and sister-in-law in the region of San Salvador. She shares the household expenses with them which is a great help because this way she is able to provide her kids with everything they need.

Reyna has a general store and she invests a large part of her time because it is her only source of income. She requests a loan to invest in her business by purchasing a larger quantity of products, both food products and household products. She expects to improve her profits and she will come out ahead together with her family.

loans.use: To purchase general store merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy eyeglass repair parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cosmetics and home appliances to sell.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús S. C. de 34 años de edad, reside en Sensuntepeque, en el departamento de Cabañas. Él vive junto a su esposa la cual trabaja como comerciante de productos varios, y así mismo vive junto a su pequeña hija de 3 años de edad, quien es la mayor inspiración de Manuel para salir adelante. Manuel se dedica a la comercialización de mochilas, cinchos, carteras y bolsos, su negocio se encuentra a las afueras del mercado regional de Sensuntepeque, en donde hay una gran afluencia de personas, quienes en su mayoría consumen sus productos. Manuel solicita un préstamo para poder comprar mayor cantidad de mochilas, y de esta manera aprovechar la temporada de inicio de clases, comprando mochilas y bolsones por mayor de manera que pueda vender a precios más bajo lo cual le permita contar con más clientes. De esta manera él espera mejorar en gran manera sus ganancias y poder vivir mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús S. C. is 34 years old and lives in Sensuntepeque, in Cabañas department.  He lives with his wife who works selling a variety of products.  He also lives with his 3 year-old daughter who is Manuel's biggest inspiration to get ahead in life.  Manuel sells backpacks, belts, wallets and bags.  His business is located on the edge of Sensuntepeque regional market which is a busy area with a lot of people who buy his products.

Manuel is requesting a loan so that he can buy more backpacks and, in this way, take advantage of the back-to-school season, buying backpacks and school bags wholesale so that he can sell them more cheaply which will attract him more customers.  In this way, he hopes to improve his profits and be able to live more comfortably together with his family.

loans.use: To buy backpacks to sell

loans.name: Flores Del Tepeyac Group

texts.es: Este grupo se encuentra ubicado en Puebla, México; en una pequeña colonia  que se encuentra conurbada a la ciudad de Puebla, es por eso que cuenta con buena afluencia comercial; este grupo está integrado por 10 mujeres, trabajadoras, honestas y emprendedoras, que decidieron llamarse FLORES DEL TEPEYAC en alusión al nombre de su colonia y de las flores del milagro de la virgen de guadalupe. La Señora Alma Margarita fue electa la Tesorera del grupo por tratarse de una persona responsable y honesta como el resto del grupo, ademas de ser muy entusiasta y manejar muy bien la contabilidad; ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida a todos los conductores de una ruta de linea de transporte público, ella todos los dias se traslada con sus envases de comida, el proposito de adquirir un crédito con nosotros es porque requiere el dinero para reparar el automovil en el que todos los dias traslada su comida para la venta; para ella el exito significa tener una casa propia para dejarles un patrimonio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
This group is located in Puebla, Mexico, in a small district on the outskirts of the city of Puebla.  The area has a lot of commercial activity.  The group has 10 female members who are all hard working, honest and enterprising.  They decided to call their group "Flores del Tepeyac" (Flowers of El Tepeyac).  With this name, they are making reference to the name of their neighborhood and the flowers that appeared in the miracle of the Virgin of Guadalupe.

Alma Margarita was elected as the group's treasurer as she is a responsible and honest person like the other members of the group.  She is also very enthusiastic and very good at doing accounts.  Alma Margarita's business is making meals and selling them to all the drivers on a public transport route.  Every day she travels there with her meal containers.

Alma Margarita would like this loan from us as she needs the money to repair the car that she uses every day to transport the meals that she sells.  For her, success would be to own her own home so that she would then have an inheritance to leave her children.

loans.use: To repair the car she uses to transport her meals

loans.name: Deya

texts.en:
Deya is a 28-year-old man from Gaza city in the Gaza Strip. Deya is married and a father of two daughters and two sons. Deya is a fisherman. He fishes in the Mediterranean Sea and sells the fresh fish in Gaza city.

Deya took a loan from FATEN to purchase a new boat and replace the old fishing kit he uses. Deya enjoys his work and wants to improve it, though it is not as rewarding as it used to be due to many complications in Gaza city.

Deya appears in the picture here next to his fishing kit.

loans.use: To purchase a fishing kit and fishing boat

loans.name: Paloma Blanca Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama PALOMA BLANCA.Todas se sienten identificadas con la pureza y se sienten libres de volar en la vida,La Sra.Socorro Arias Blanco,es la presidenta del grupo,tiene 39 años,tres hijos, 2 niños de  17 y 16 años y una niña de 13.estudió carrera técnica,es la segunda vez que solicita crédito y ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos,su negocio es la venta de pan,negocio en el que lleva 5 años,su crédito lo invertirá en materias primas para apoyarse e iniciar bien este año,con ello busca tener una solides económica más estable.
texts.en: The group is named "Paloma Blanca" (white dove). All the members identify with its purity and feel free to fly in life. Socorro Arias Blanco is the president of the group. She is 39 years old and has three children, two boys that are 17 and 16 years old and a girl that is 13 years old. She studied a technical career. This is the second time she is requesting a loan. She has been very punctual in her payments. Her business is selling bread. She has been in this business for five years. She will invest her loan in supplies so that she can support herself and start the year off well so that she can have more economic stability.

loans.use: Purchase supplies.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es: Petrona se dedica a la venta de tortillas, granos básicos. Ella es una persona muy luchadora pues no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos con Fundación que han sido de gran apoyo para su negocio. Tiene más de 20 años, en su negocio ella conoce muy bien a su clientes y lo que ellos le solicitan. Inicio desde muy joven cuando no tenía muchos ingresos para su hogar y con el paso del tiempo es que ha logrado obtener su propio negocio. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de tortillas, granos básicos, y venta de raspaditas. Desea aumentar su capital de trabajo que es lo elemental para seguir creciendo con su negocio.
texts.en:
Petrona sells tortillas and basic grains.  She is a very determined person because this isn’t the first time she’s negotiated a loan with the Fundación that has been very useful for her business.

She’s been in business for over 20 years; she knows her customers and what they want very well.  She started while still very young and didn’t have much income for her home.  In time, she’s managed to obtain her own business.

She will use the requested loan to buy tortillas, basic grains and for her scratch off lottery ticket sales.  She wants to increase her working capital which is basic to continue growing in business.

loans.use: To buy tortillas and basic grains.

loans.name: Frank

texts.es: El Sr. Frank vive en el municipio de el Torno, es nacido en el Bermejo de la provincia florida de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, su esposa se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, tienen un hijo que se encuentra en edad escolar, su actividad es el transporte urbano de pasajeros, pertenece a la línea de moto taxi, hace unos dos años que se dedica a esta actividad, el destino el crédito es para hacerle mantenimiento a su motocicleta, vive en casa familiar por lo que están ahorrando para comparar un lote de terreno y construir su domicilio propio, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado, en la foto el Sr. Frank se encuentra acompañado de su Sra. esposa.
texts.en:
Frank lives in El Torno.  He was born in El Bermejo in the city of Santa Cruz’s Florida province.  His wife sells cosmetics.  They have a school age son.  He provides urban passenger transportation services.  He’s a member of a mototaxi route.  He’s been in this business for two years. The loan will be used for motorcycle maintenance and repair.  

They live in the family home and this is why they are saving up to buy a lot and build their own house.  He is a very hard working person who is very grateful to the institution for the support it’s provided.

In the photo, Frank appears in the company of his wife.

loans.use: For motorcycle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, donde vive con su madre y un hermano, él es soltero, se dedica a destazar res y al mismo tiempo es empleado, su negocio es destazar el ganado y vender la carne en su casa, este oficio lo aprendió de su abuela, y lo está haciendo desde hace tres años, por el momento su inconveniente es comprar ganado para seguir en el negocio, ya que no cuenta con los fondos para comprar y comercializar la carne, por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar la inversión en reces, con esta ayuda estará aumentando su potencial como destazador y seguirá produciendo para su familia ingresos que cubran aquellas necesidades que a diario se presentan en el hogar.
Su objetivo en mantener el negocio y hacerlo crecer para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar lives in El Transito, San Miguel department with his mother and a brother.  He’s single and butchers beef; he is also employed.  

His business is butchering cattle to sell the meat from home.  He learned this occupation from his grandmother and he’s been doing it for the last three years.  Currently he faces the inconvenience of not having funds to buy cattle to stay in business selling beef.  This is why he’s asking for a loan to invest in steers.  The help will make it possible for him to increase his potential as a butcher and he will continue to produce income for his family to cover daily household needs.

His goal is to keep the business and make it grow in order to get ahead with his family.

loans.use: To buy cattle to butcher.

loans.name: Romel

texts.es:
Romel, reside en Semsembra departamento de Morazán, donde vive con su esposa y dos hijos, Romel tiene 39 años de edad y se dedica a la crianza de ganado y el procesamiento de productos lácteos,  como cuajada, queso, crema, este negocio lo tienen desde hace mucho tiempo, pues sus familias desde siempre se  han dedicado a criar ganado y a comercializar los productos provenientes de la leche,  por el momento él cuenta con el apoyo de algunos cuñados y amigos, la ventaja de este negocio es que la producción es todo el año y que ellos tienen experiencia en el ganado.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de harinilla y heno (zacate), ya que en esta época de verano se debe comprar estos alimentos para el ganado puesto que los terrenos secan su pasto por la época, este préstamo le ayudara muchísimo para cubrir con la alimentación de un buen tiempo para el ganado, en esta actividad los riesgos son mínimos y por la experiencia que se tiene buscan la manera de forma anticipada de mantener en buenas condiciones al ganado para que siempre produzca leche.
Su sueño es poder darle a sus hijos y esposa una vida mejor, es por tal motivo que trabaja para que su familia tenga una condición estable, proveyendo lo necesario para ellos, así también quiere desarrollarse y crecer en el área agropecuaria.
texts.en:
Romel lives in Semsembra in the department of Morazán with his wife and two children. Romel is 39 years old. He raises livestock and makes dairy products such as curd, cheese and cream. He has been in this business for a long time since his family has always raised livestock and sold dairy products. Currently, he counts on the support of some of his brothers-in-law and friends. The benefit of this business is that production is year-round and that he has experience with livestock. 

Romel is requesting a loan to buy middlings and hay (grass) because he has to buy this feed for the livestock during the summer season because the grasses are dried depending on the season. This loan will help a lot in covering the livestock feed for a long time. The risks are minimal in this business and because of the experience he has he finds a way in advance to maintain the livestock in good condition so that they can always produce milk. 

His dream is to be able to provide his children and wife with a better life. This is why he works so that his family can have stable conditions by providing the necessary for them. He also wants to develop and grow in the agricultural field.

loans.use: Purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Crecer Group

texts.es: La Sra. Doris es la nueva presidenta del grupo “Crecer”, el cual lleva 10 años D. creado y lo conforma 10 vecinos y amigos, Doris a sus 29 años está casada y tiene dos hijos D. 10 y 6 años, ella lleva 2 años trabajando con Edaprospo y ah trabajado vendiendo productos D. belleza por más D. 4 años, el ultimo préstamo lo piensa invertir en mas D. estos productos, también comprara ropa para la venta a pedido D. sus vecinas. Actualmente está terminando su carrera D. operatividad D. maquinas industriales y tiene el proyecto D. poner su propio centro D. confeccion D. polos y camisas, pero para esto necesita que Edaprospo le brinD. sus habilitaciones para poder ahorrar con este fin.
texts.en: Señora Doris is the new president of the group called "To Grow", which was formed 10 years ago and is maD. up of 10 neighbors and friends.  Doris, at 29 years of age, is married and has two children, ages 10 and 6. She has been working with Edaprospo for 2 years.  She has worked selling beauty products for more than 4 years.  She will invest her latest loan in buying more of these products as well as buying clothing to sell to order to her neighbors.   At present she is finishing her career as an operator of industrial machinery and she plans to open her own workshop for making polos and shirts, but to do this she needs the support of Edaprospo to be able to save for this goal.

loans.use: To buy products and supplies for various businesses

loans.name: Roxana Lissette

texts.es:
Roxana, tiene 34 años de edad, reside en Usulután, vive con su esposo y sus hijas, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y merienda, este negocio lo tiene hace 3 años, con la ayuda de sus hijas lo realiza cada día, su único inconveniente por el momento es no tener un inventario de materiales para producir la venta.
Por esta situación solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz y alimentos para preparar las meriendas, como pollo, queso, frijoles y aceite, este préstamo le permitirá tener materiales a su disposición para preparar la venta en el momento que desee, además de que con este préstamo estará fortaleciendo el negocio y mantenerlo por vario tiempo para proveer ingresos a su hogar.
Su objetivo es mantener el negocio e ir mejorándolo poco a poco para lograr un aumento en la clientela y en la producción de los alimentos, de esta manera mantener en buenas condiciones el negocio.
texts.en:
Roxana is 34 years old and lives in Usulután with her husband and her daughters. She sells tortillas and lunch. She has had this business for three years. She works every day with the help of her daughters. Her only obstacle right now is that she does not have an inventory of supplies to make her sales. This is why she is requesting a loan to buy corn and food such as chicken, cheese, beans and oil to prepare lunches. This loan will allow her to have supplies at her disposal to prepare food when she needs to. This loan is to strengthen her business and to keep it going for some time so that she can provide the income to her home. 

Her goal is to sustain her business and to keep improving it little by little so that she can increase her customers and the production of food and to maintain the business in good condition.

loans.use: Purchase corn and food to prepare lunches.

loans.name: Jose Joaquin

texts.es:
José Joaquín tiene 37 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, donde posee casa propia y vive junto a su madre, está soltero y se dedica a la venta y reparación de bicicletas y helados, este negocio tiene aproximadamente 15 años de existir y ha ido mejorando con el tiempo, él ya tiene  experiencia en el manejo de este negocio.
A José se le ha presentado la oportunidad de obtener un lote de bicicletas nuevas para comercializarlas pero no cuenta con la cantidad de dinero que valen estas bicicletas, por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra, este préstamo será la oportunidad para crecer en el negocio ya que podrá ofrecer a sus clientes diferentes modelos para todos los gustos, además de fortalecer su inventario.
Su proyección es seguir en desarrollo con el negocio, ofrecer bicicletas de calidad y con estilos nuevos, atender bien a sus clientes y ser más competente.
texts.en:
José Joaquín is 37 years old.  He lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department where he owns his own home and lives together with his mother.  He is single and his business is selling and repairing bicycles.  He has been in this business for approximately 15 years and it has improved over time.  He has experience running his business.

José has the opportunity of obtaining a set of new bicycles to sell but he doesn't have the money to buy them.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to make the purchase.  This loan will be an opportunity for him to grow in his business since he will be able to offer his customers different models of bicycle to suit all tastes.  It will also strengthen his inventory.

José's plans are to continue developing his business, to offer good-quality bicycles in new styles, to serve his customers well and to be more proficient in his business.

loans.use: To buy a set of bicycles

loans.name: Ingrid

texts.es: La Sra. Ingrid y su esposo el Sr. Emilio son buenos clientes de nuestra institución desde el año 2005, actualmente viven en la zona Villa Copacabana la cual se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos del centro de la ciudad. La Sra. Ingrid se dedica a la venta de comida en su restaurant desde hace cuatro años y su especialidad son los platos con carne de cerdo como ser el chicharrón de cerdo y el fricase los cuales son los mas solicitados por sus clientes. El esposo de doña Ingrid es técnico electrónico y tiene un taller de reparaciones y el dinero del crédito la Sra. Ingrid invertirá en la compra de repuestos para el taller de su esposo,  Ellos actualmente viven en anticrético y uno de sus mayores anhelos es poder ahorrar lo suficiente para poder comprar su casa propia. Debido a la puntualidad que demostraron durante estos años de cliente de emprender es que ahora se los premia como clientes kiva. Ellos están muy contentos de trabajar de esta manera y están seguros de que podrán seguir creciendo  con sus negocios y así logar cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en: Ingrid and her husband Emilio have been good clients of this institution since 2005. They currently live in the Villa Copacabana neighborhood which is located twenty minutes from the center of the city. Ingrid has been selling food at her restaurant for four years and her specialty is plates with pork such as fried pork skin and fricase which are the most requested by her customers. Her husband is an electronic technician and he has a repair shop. The loan she is requesting will be invested in buying spare parts for her husband's shop. They currently rent their home and one of their biggest dreams is to be able to save enough to buy their own home. Because of the punctuality they have shown during the years, they are now rewarded as clients of Kiva. They are very happy to be working this way and are sure that they will be able to continue growing with their businesses and in this way be able to fulfill their dreams.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for her husband's business.

loans.name: Marvin Esperanza

texts.es:
Marvín, tiene 32 años de edad, reside en Concepción Batres, departamento de Usulután, posee casa propia viviendo con sus tres hijos de 9,  13 y 15 años de edad, se dedica a la ganadería y agricultura, posee 20 reses y cultiva una manzana de maíz y una manzana de tierra de maicillo, ella está al frente de estos trabajos que desarrolla con la ayuda de mozos.
Por el momento solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado de repasto y en la reparación de los terrenos, con esta ayuda aumentara su número de ganado y mejorara las condiciones de los terrenos para los cultivos y para mantener el ganado.
Su objetivo es velar por que su trabajo este bien, los terrenos en las mejores condiciones, aumentar el ganado y alimentarlo para poder comercializarlo a buen precio, de esta manera estará mejorando los ingresos a la familia y ofrecerles una calidad de vida diferente.
texts.en:
Marvin is 32 years old and lives in Concepcion Batres in the department of Usulutan. She has her own home and lives with her three children ages 9, 13 and 15. She dedicates herself to livestock and farming. She has 20 heads of cattle and cultivates 7000 square meters of corn and 7000 square meters of sorghum. She is at the forefront of this work which she does with the help of porters. 

Currently, she is requesting  a loan to purchase cattle and to fix her land. With this help she will increase the number of livestock and she will improve the condition of her land for her crops and to support the livestock. 

Her goals are to ensure that her work goes well, that her land is in the best condition and to increase the number of livestock and feed it so that she can sell it at a good price. This way she will be improving the family's income and she will be able to provide them a different quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase livestock and repairing land.

loans.name: La Union En Progreso 1 Group

texts.en:
Hipolita is a member of the “La Union en Progreso 1” (the unit to progress). They are micro businesspeople in clothing sales, sales of natural products, shoes, teachers, food sales, etc. in the city of Hato Mayor, one of the most rural cities in the country whose economy depends on agriculture.

This associate of Esperanza is a mother of four children. She’s married and started her business with some of her savings. She is now in her fourth year and receiving her 8th loan. Each previous loan has been repaid satisfactorily and she has maD. good investments.

She is currently operating a “Decoration businees” she sews bedlinen and curtains, also she fabrics pillow cover, branchet, and complements for bedroom and bathroom. She is planning to use the new loan to buy linen, threads, embellishments, needles, etc.

She will use profits to reinvest in her business, to pay public utilities and to save some in order to help her children and improve her business.

Her favorite pastime is to do business and her primary challenge is caring for her children.

loans.use: to buy linen, threads, embellishments, needles, etc.

loans.name: Maritsa Maria

texts.es: Maritsa tiene 45 años de edad cuenta con domicilio propio ubicado en Subtanjalla vive con su esposo y su mejor hijo de 16 años de edad Maritsa se inicio hace varios años en el negocio de la venta de ropa de forma ambulatoria en la actualidad recibe pedidos de mercaderia y tiene un pequeño negocio de ropa ubicado en su domicilio, el financiamiento otorgado sera destinado para la compra de mercaderia, se le otorga el financiamiento por contar con buenas referencias,voluntad y capacidad de pago.
texts.en: Maritsa is 45 years old. She lives in her own home in Subtanjalla with her husband and her son who is 16 years old. Maritsa started selling clothes several years ago as a street vendor. Currently, she receives orders for her merchandise and she has a small clothing shop in her home. The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase merchandise. This funding is being awarded to her because of her good references and her will and ability to maker her payment.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: La Sra. Paulina vive en el torno, es nacida en el departamento de Potosí, capital minera de Bolivia, su actividad es la venta de verdura en el mercado abasto de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, el mercado abasto uno de los mercados mas concurridos de la Ciudad por sus precios económicos en los que venden los productos, la Sra. Paulina   hace unos 30 años que se dedica a este negocio, el destino del crédito es para la compra de verduras y madera ya que su esposo es carpintero, sus hijos son independientes por lo que ellos viven solo, y para su edad son auto sostenibles, se sienten agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Señora Paulina lives in El Torno.  She was born in the department of Potosi, mining capital of Bolivia.  Her activity is the sale of vegetables in the supply market of the city of Santa Cruz.  The supply market is one of the most frequented markets of the city, because of the economical prices offered by the vendors.  Señora Paulina has been dedicated to this work for about 30 years.  The loan will be used to purchase vegetables and wood, since her husband is a carpenter. Her children are independent and live on their own and, for their age, they are reasonably self-sustaining.  She is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered to her.

loans.use: to buy vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Soila Esperanza

texts.es:
Doña Soila, tiene 67 años D. edad,  resiD. en San Rafael Oriente, departamento D. San Miguel, se dedica prestar servicio con un molino D. motor y corriente donD. tritura granos básicos, este molino lo administra desD. hace 35 años, atienD. a los vecinos cercanos y algunos D. la zona que aun que no les queD. muy cerca asisten donD. ella, D. este negocio recibe a diario ingresos para su gasto personal y cubrir sus necesidades.
Ella está con el proyecto D.  ampliar y mejorar la vivienda por lo que solicita un préstamo para llevar a cabo el mejoramiento D. su casa D. habitación, ella quiere construirle un corredor para descansar y tener más espacio; Su objetivo es realizar el trabajo D. la mejor manera y mantener su vivienda bonita y en buenas condiciones para sentirse más segura dentro D. ella.
texts.en:
Soila is 67 years old.  She lives in San Rafael Oriente, in San Miguel department and provides a service with her motorized mill, grinding basic grains.  She has been providing milling services for 35 years.  She serves her neighbors and some other people who live in the area who come to her even though they aren't very close by.  She makes daily income from this business that covers her personal expenses and needs.

Soila is working on extending and improving her home.  She is requesting a loan so that she can carry out improvements to her home.  She would like to build a porch where she can relax and have more space.  Her goal is to carry out the work in the best way possible and to keep her house beautiful and in good condition so that she can feel safer insiD. it.

loans.use: To expand and improve her home

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María D. 35 años D. edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos en Lolotiquillo, departamento D. Morazán, se dedica a la venta D. pupusas y bebidas, este negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado municipal D. Lolotiquillo, donD. a diario ofrece a sus clientes lo mejor en bebidas y pupusas.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar ingredientes para la preparación D. las pupusas  como chicharrón, pollo,  quesillo, tomates, condimentos y compra D. bebidas, con este préstamo tendrá la oportunidad D. mejorar su inventario y D. contar con todo lo necesario para disponer D. él al momento D. realizar la venta.
Su propósito principal es mejorar su calidad D. vida, ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios, a través del buen manejo del negocio y brindando una buena atención y servicio a los clientes.
texts.en:
María, 35 years of age, lives with her husband and two children in Lolotiquillo, department of Morazán.  She is dedicated to the sale of pupusas and drinks. (Pupusas are a traditional Salvadoran dish maD. from a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, meat, or vegetables.)  This business is located in the municipal market of Lolotiquillo, where she offers the best drinks and pupusas to her clients daily.
She is requesting a loan to purchase drinks and ingredients for the preparation of pupusas, such as pork rinds, chicken, cheese, tomatoes, and condiments.  With this loan she will have the opportunity to improve her inventory and be able to rely on having what she needs available at her point of sale.  Her principal goals are to improve her quality of life and help her children in their studies, in addition to providing good management to her business and offering good attention and service to her clients.

loans.use: Compra de chicharrón, pollo,  quesillo, tomates, condimentos y compra de bebidas

loans.name: Eleuterio

texts.es: El Sr. Eleuterio Vive en la localidad de Santa Rita perteneciente al municipio de el torno, Es nacido en el departamento de Chuquisaca, conocida como la ciudad de los cuatro nombres y capital de Bolivia, hace unos 14 años que llego a la ciudad de Santa Cruz; su esposa con la cual tiene tres hijos, trabaja como empleada domestica, el destino del crédito es para la compra de materiales de construcción y una línea de moto taxi, hace unos ocho años que se dedica a la venta de ganado, en la feria de la comunidad, también como segunda actividad se dedica al transporte de personas, en la comunidad( moto taxi urbano),  esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Eleuterio lives in Santa Rita, which belongs to the El Torno municipality.  He was born in the Chuquisaca department, which is known as the city with four names, and it is the capital of Bolivia (Chuquisaca is the native name for Sucre).

He came to the city of Santa Cruz fourteen years ago.  He and his wife have three children, and his wife works as a domestic employee.  

The loan is to buy construction materials and a “moto taxi” (three wheeled motorized vehicle) line.  

He has been selling livestock at the community fair for eight years.  As a second activity, he also works in passenger transportation in the community (urban moto taxi).

He is grateful to the institution for the support it has provided.

loans.use: To buy a moto taxi line, and to repair his house

loans.name: Brisas De California Group

texts.es: La señora Rocio tiene 40 años y tiene dos niñas D. 10 y cuatro años, lleva 1 año trabajando con Edaprospo en el Grupo “Brisas D. California” junto a siete vecinos-amigos que pusieron el nombre al grupo por el asentamiento humano donD. viven. Rocio venD. tortas, quesos, queques y dulces ambulantemente en la zona D. Chaclacayo desD. hace cinco años, también venD. ropas a pedido. Ella comenzó a trabajar para ayudar a su hijo y su pareja, aunque espera en el futuro poner una tienda D. abarrotes en sus casa, para esto indica que está ahorrando y que las habilitaciones D. Edaprospo le servirán D. mucho para llevara  a cabo sus metas.
texts.en:
Rocio is 40 years old.  She has two daughters, ages ten and four.  She has been working with Edaprospo for one year.  She works with the “Brisas D. California” (California Breezes) group with seven neighbors and or friends who gave the group its name because of the settlement where they live.

Rocio sells sandwiches, cheese, cakes, and sweets in an itinerant manner in the Chaclacayo zone.  She has been doing this for five years.  She also sells clothes by order.  She started to work to help her son and his life partner.  In the future she hopes to establish a grocery store in her house.  To do so, she is saving.  The assistance from Edaprospo will serve her well so that she can achieve her goals.

loans.use: To buy products and supplies

loans.name: Lourdes Guadalupe

texts.es:
Lourdes de 30 años de edad, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, actualmente vive con sus padres y hermanos, esta soltera tiene un negocio en el mercado municipal de Jucuapa donde vende ropa blusas, pantalones, camisas, short, y ropa interior, este negocio fue iniciado por una de sus hermanas, quien decidió dejar que fuera administrado por ella desde hace cinco años, trabajando de lunes a sábado.
Lourdes por el momento necesita invertir en el negocio y solicita un préstamo para poder realizarlo, ya que carece de recursos y debe mantener mercadería que esta de moda ya que en este tipo de actividad lo mejor es estar  atento a lo último en mercadería para ofrecer a los clientes.
Este préstamo le ayudara para aumentar el inventario y ha atender mejor a los clientes, siguiendo sus aspiraciones de ser una gran comerciante incrementando su negocio e instalando un nuevo negocio en otro punto del mercado.
texts.en:
Lourdes, age 30, lives in the Jucuapa department of Usulután.  She currently lives with her parents and her siblings.  She is single, and she has a business in the Jucuapa municipal market.  She sells clothes like blouses, pants, shirts, shorts, and underwear.  This business was started by one of her sisters, who five years ago decided to let Lourdes run the business for her.  She works Monday through Saturday.

Lourdes now needs to invest in the business.  She is requesting a loan to be able to do so because she lacks the resources.  She needs to keep stylish merchandise in stock.  In this type of business activity the best thing is to be alert to the latest in merchandise to offer her customers.

This loan will help her increase her inventory and to better take care of her customers.  She is following her aspirations to be a great merchant by increasing her business and setting up a new business at another spot in the market.

loans.use: To buy clothes to increase her inventory

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan de 27 años de edad, reside en Nueva Guadalupe, departamento de San Miguel, su familia esta conformada por su hijo de dos años de edad y su esposa, Juan es empleado de una farmacia desempeñándose como motorista desde hace 3 años, de lunes a viernes.
Él esta en proceso de realizarle mejoras a la vivienda y solicita un préstamo como ayuda a complementar los gastos en cemento, hierro, ladrillos, piedra y arena, esta inversión es un plan que ya tenia junto a su esposa en construir un dormitorio y la cocina, pero debido a los pocos recursos con los que cuenta debió sacar un préstamo para complementar y poder realizar completamente la inversión y mejoría de la casa.
Las aspiraciones de Juan es seguir trabajando con por mejorar cada día su vivienda para que su familia este mas cómoda y segura, además de que su hijo crecerá  con un buen espacio para su recreación, además quiere velar por el bienestar de su hijo y por sus estudios.
texts.en: Juan, 17 years of age, resides in Nueva Guadalupe, department of San Miguel.  His family is composed of his son, age two and his wife.  Juan is employed in a pharmacy where he has worked as a driver for three years, from Monday to Friday.  He is in the process of making improvements to his home and requests a loan to help with expenses for cement, iron, bricks, stone and sand.   This investment is for a plan that he and his wife have already begun to build a bedroom and kitchen.  But due to their few resources he needs a loan to complement his savings and to be able to complete the improvements to the house.  Juan's aspirations are to continue working to improve his dwelling each day so that his family will be more comfortable and secure, and also so that his son will grow with a good space for his recreation.  In addition he wants to watch out for the welfare of his son and for his studies.

loans.use: To buy materials such as cement, iron, bricks, stone and sand.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es:
Isaías, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos de 6, 4, 3 y 1 año de edad, él tiene 28 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos, desde hace seis años, este negocio lo aprendió de su padre ya que al igual que él se dedica a la venta de productos derivados de la leche, su trabajo es de lunes a sábado y es la única fuente de ingreso con la cuenta para sostener su hogar.
Por el momento Isaías quiere adquirir más productos para comercializar, por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita adquirir dichos productos, con la idea de mantener siempre una buena cantidad para atender la demanda de los clientes, su compra será en queso, crema, queso fresco y quesillo, con esta inversión su negocio será fortalecido y mejorara sus ingresos familiares ya que tendrá la posibilidad de vender más manteniendo estable el comercio.
Su sueño es atender a nuevas zonas de mercado, ampliándose y obteniendo el reconocimiento de muchos clientes, también de su negocio espera mejorar la condición de vida de su familia y dar el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Isaías, residing in Jucuapa department of Usulután, lives with his wife and four children ages 6, 4, 3 and 1 years.  He is 28 years of age. He has been dedicated to the sale of dairy products for six years. He learned this business from his father, since he was also dedicated to selling products derived from milk.  He works from Monday to Saturday.  This is the only source of income for his household. 
At the moment, Isaías would like to acquire more products to sell.  He has requested a loan which will permit him to buy said products, with the idea of always maintaining a good quantity to meet the demands of his clients. His purchases will be cheese, cream, cheese curds and string cheese.  With this investment his business will be fortified and his family income will improve, now that he will have the possibility to sell more and maintain a steady commerce.   
His dream is to expand into new markets, growing and obtaining more clients.  With his business he hopes to improve the living conditions for his family and give an education to his children.

loans.use: To buy cheese, cream, cheese curds and string cheese.

loans.name: Unidos Para Progresar Group

texts.en:
Miguelina is a member of the “Unidos Para Progresar” (Unite to progress) 1 & 2. a group compound with ten micro businesspeople in clothing sales, shoes, food sales, etc. in the city of Hato Mayor, one of the most rural cities in the country whose economy depends on agriculture. Miguelina is a mother of three children and she live together with her long term partner. She started her business with the first loan she got from Esperanza. She is receiving her 9th loan. Each previous loan has been repaid satisfactorily and she has maD. good investments.

She is currently operating a "Combustible or fuel sales”. She is planning to use the new loan to buy fuel from retailers and sell it by bottles or gallons in her community. She will use profits to save, because she wants to improve her business and make her dreams and most difficult challenges come true.  She wants to have and build her own house, in a safe structure.  Her favorite pastime is to be with her children.

loans.use: to buy fuel.

loans.name: Claudia De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Claudia D. 37 años D. edad, resiD. en San Buenaventura departamento D. Usulután, vive con su familia y tres hijos D. 14, 12 y 8 años D. edad, ella tiene un chalet en el instituto nacional D. Jucuapa donD. venD. pupusas, gaseosas, panes, boquitas, a los estudiantes D. lunes a viernes, realizándolo desD. hace 12 años. Próximamente se inicia el año escolar y Claudia debe iniciar con el inventario D. productos para lo que solicita un préstamo y poder mediante este adquirir todo lo necesario para comenzar a vender a los estudiantes.
Los productos que deberá comprar son gaseosas, boquitas, pan, y para las pupusas, maíz, quesillo, repollo y tomates. Este préstamo le ayudara a iniciar su inventario y que pueda en este nuevo año continuar trabajando para su familia y cubrir las necesidades más urgentes.
Su propósito es continuar con este negocio por muchos años, ayudar a su familia en lo económico y a sus hijos cooperarles en su educación y estudios para que puedan ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Claudia, age 37, lives in San Buenaventura in the Usulután department.  She lives with her family and three children, ages 14, 12, and 8.  She has a stand in the National Institute of Jucuapa.  She sells “pupusas” (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans), soft drinks, bread, and snacks.  She sells to the students from Monday through Friday.  She has been doing this for 12 years.

The school year starts soon, and Claudia needs to start getting products for her inventory.  That is why she is requesting a loan, to be able to get everything she needs to start selling to the students.  The products that she needs to buy are soft drinks, snacks, and bread.  For the pupusas she needs corn, fresh cheese, cabbage and tomatoes.

This loan will help her with her inventory.  She will be able to, in this new year, continue working for her family and to cover the most urgent necessities.  Her intentions are to continue working in this business for many years, to help her family financially, and to contribute to her children’s education so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, snacks, bread, and she will buy corn, fresh cheese, cabbage and tomatoes for the pupusas

loans.name: Hilda Veronica

texts.es:
Hilda, tiene 31 años D. edad, resiD. en Ereguayquin, Usulután, posee una panadería, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, D. 10 y 3 años D. edad, tiene casa propia, ella aprendió el proceso D. hacer pan desD. los 12 años D. edad, porque su madre también tiene panadería y le inculco desD. muy pequeña este oficio, desD. el año 2004 ella decidió instalar su propio negocio.
En la actualidad ella posee el negocio y el horno donD. se cocina el pan es D. barro y lo tiene ubicado en el patio D. su casa sin protección para lluvias por lo que ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. materiales para construirle una casita al horno para protegerlo D. las lluvias y D. cualquier causa D. daño al horno, con este préstamo estará comprando lamina y hierro para llevar a cabo la construcción.
El objetivo D. Hilda es mejorar el establecimiento del negocio para que tenga más vida útil el horno ya que D. él depenD. el comercio del pan y la alimentación D. los hijos.
texts.en:
Hilda, age 31, lives in Ereguayquin, Usulután.  She has a bakery.  She lives with her husband and two children, ages 10 and 3.  She has her own house.

She learned the process of making bread when she was 12 years old because her mother also has a bakery.  She was taught this traD. when she was very little.  In the year 2004 she decided to establish her own business.

She currently has the business.  The oven where she bakes the bread is maD. of clay.  It is located on the patio of her house.  It is not protected from the rains.  That is why she is requesting a loan.  She wants to buy materials to build a structure to protect the oven from the rains and anything else that might damage it.  She will use the loan to buy tin and iron to carry out the construction.

Hilda’s objective is to improve her business establishment so that the oven has a longer, useful life.  Feeding her children is dependent upon her bread business.

loans.use: To buy tin and iron to build a roof for the oven she uses to bake bread

loans.name: Raul Braulio

texts.es: El Sr. Raúl se encuentra en su segunda secuencia el tiene un hijo de 3 años, el vive en la casa de su mamá  que es la Sra. Benita que una cliente antigua de la institución  ya esta mas de 11 años trabajando con emprender, ellos viven en la zona de Chasquipampa, Raúl trabaja con la volqueta de su mamá  en la compra venta de arena fina, arena corriente y piedra en este momento requiere de incremento de capital, por lo que se solicita el financiamiento kiva por ser un buen cliente, es una persona trabajadora y responsable, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Raúl is in his second loan cycle.  He has a three year-old son and lives in his mom's house.  His mom, Benita, is a long-standing client of our institution.  She has been working with Emprender for more than 11 years.  They live in Chasquipampa district.

Raúl works with his mom's dump truck, buying and selling fine sand, medium-grade sand and stone.  Right now he needs an increase in his capital which is why he is requesting a Kiva loan.  He is a good client, hard working and responsible.  He is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered him.

loans.use: To increase his capital (buying and selling sand and stone)

loans.name: Justiniano

texts.es:
Don Justiniano tiene 56 años de edad, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la reparación de bicicletas, su familia son sus hijos y esposa, él tiene 14 años de dedicarse a la reparación de bicicletas, por el momento su problema es no tener el inventario adecuado de repuestos lo que le dificulta dar salida a los trabajos. 
Por tal situación solicita un préstamo para comprar repuestos y mantener un buen inventario para dar salida a los trabajos de los clientes, este préstamo le ayudara a realizar su trabajo más rápido y satisfacer a los clientes en el tiempo de espera por la reparación, también contara con la recomendación de buen servicio por sus clientes atendiendo a muchos trabajos de la mejor manera.
Su objetivo es contar con ingresos estables para ayudar a su familia, y mejorar la condición de vida actual, manteniendo un buen negocio con buena administración.
texts.en:
Justiniano is 56 years old.  He lives in Jiquilisco, in Usulután department, and repairs bicycles.  His family consists of his children and his wife.  Justiniano has been repairing bicycles for 14 years.

Right now Justiniano's problem is that he doesn't have an adequate stock of spare parts which makes it difficult for him to do his work.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy spare parts and to keep a good stock so that he can carry out his customers' work.  This loan will help him to carry out his work more quickly and satisfy his customers by doing it on time.  His customers will recommend him because of his good service as he will be able to do more work and do it well.

Justiniano's goal is to make stable income to help his family and to improve his current living conditions, keeping his good business running by managing it well.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his bicycle workshop

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, de 30 años de edad, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, vive con su  esposo y tres hijos, administra un molino de granos básicos, ella se dedica a este molino desde hace 7 años sirviéndoles a los vecinos y personas cercanas al lugar.
Este negocio le ayuda a tener ingresos diarios para su hogar, los clientes le llevan el maíz, café, cacao, o cualquier producto que quieran pulverizar. Ella está solicitando un préstamo para remodelar las instalaciones del molino,  ya que por no tener las condiciones adecuadas y seguras, le robaron un molino ocasionándole pérdidas. Ana lo pretende es construir o mejorar las paredes del local volviéndolas más seguras para no tener un nuevo percance.
Este préstamo le ayudara a mantener en condiciones adecuadas el molino y seguir brindando el servicio a los clientes de una excelente manera, ya que en sus planes existe la inversión de nuevos molinos para agilizar el buen servicio.
texts.en:
Ana is 30 years old and lives in Jiquilisco, in Usulután department, with her husband and three children.  She runs a basic grain mill and has been providing milling services for 7 years.  She serves her neighbors and other people who live nearby.

This business helps Ana to make daily income for her household.  Her customers bring her their corn, cacao beans, or any other product they want grinding.  Ana is requesting a loan so that she can remodel the building in which she keeps her mill since, through not having had suitable and safe conditions, one of her mills was stolen, causing her losses.

Ana plans to build new walls or improve the existing walls of her premises, making them safer so that she doesn't suffer a new mishap.  This loan will help her to keep her mill in suitable conditions and to continue providing her excellent services to her customers since she also plans to invest in new mills to speed up her good service.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to improve the building in which her mill is located

loans.name: Clarisa Guillermina

texts.es: Clarisa se dedica al servicio costura y bordado. Tiene más de 12 años con su negocio que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrados sacar adelante. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que disfruta de realizar este trabajo, pues la mayoría de sus clientes siempre están solicitándoles diferentes  productos que ella elabora. Es por eso que realiza este financiamiento con el fin de comprar hilos, telas, tijeras entre otros utensilios necesarios para la elaboración de sus productos.
texts.en:
Clarisa has been sewing and embroidering for more than 12 years and with a lot of effort, she has succeeded in getting her business ahead.  
She is a very hard-working person who enjoys her work, since the majority of her customers are always asking for different items that she makes.  That is why she is requesting the financing so that she can buy thread, fabric, scissors and other necessary supplies that she uses for her products.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: La Solucion Group

texts.es:
Elva O. A. es L. presidenta del grupo comunal "L. Solucion".  Tiene 20 años y un hijo D. 2 años.  Esta casada.

L. familia D. Elva tiene como negocio L. criaza D. cuyes.  ElL. ha aprendido D. sus padres sobre este negocio, y lleva 01 año realizandolo.  Elva no cria cuyes, sino los compran en Matahuasi y los venD. en otros lugares por un precio màs alto.  Con este prèstamo, le gustarìa invertir el L. compra D. muchos cuyes y vender en otros sitios.  Se pueD. conseguir un precio mejor con una compra màs granD., y èste prèstamo le permitirà hacer esto.
(En L. foto, Elva lleva un pantalon azul claro y un polo color morado; esta sentada, y es L. segunda D. L. derecha)
texts.en:
Elva O. A. is the president of the "L. Solucion" communal bank. She is 20 years old, and is married with a 2 year old son. 

Elva's family has a business raising guinea pigs. She has learned about the business from her parents, and has been working in the business for one year. Elva does not raise guinea pigs herself, but buys them in Matahuasi and sells them in other places at a profit. With this loan, she would like to invest in the purchase of many guinea pigs and sell them at various locations. She can get a better price for a large-scale purchase, and this loan will enable her to do so. (In the photo, Elva is the one wearing light blue trousers and a dark poloneck sweater: she is seated second from the right).

loans.use: To purchase small animals

loans.name: Virgen De Cocharcas Group

texts.es:
Elva C. Y. es la presidenta de la Alcancia: "Virgen de Cocharcas".  Tiene 35 años y es conviviente.  Tiene 3 hijos menores. 
Al igual que Elva, los demàs socios viven el el distrito de El Tambo.
Elva es dueña de un auto que comprò hace mas de 02 años y, que actualmente lo alquila a un joven chofer como taxi.  
Con este prèstamo, le gustarìa invertir en el mantenimiento del auto.  Quisiera comprar llantas nuevas y demàs repuestos que necesita; como cambiar el aceite y el lìquido de transmisiòn.
En el futuro, Elva quisiera seguir con el negocio del alquiler del auto y tambièn construir un departamento en su casa para alquilar.
(En la foto, Elva lleva una chompa a rayas de colores:rojo, blanco y negro; esta sentada y es la primera de la izquierda)
texts.en:
Elva C. Y. is the president of the Virgen de Cocharcas Community Bank. She is 35 and lives with her partner. She has three young children. 
Elva and the rest of the group members live in the El Tambo district. 
Elva owns a vehicle that she bought over two years ago, and she currently rents it to a young driver as a taxi. 
With this loan, she would like to invest in maintenance for the vehicle. She would like to buy new tires and the other spare parts that she needs; she would like to change the oil and the transmission liquid, for example. 
In the future, Elva would like to continue with her business renting the vehicle, and also build an apartment in her home to rent out. 
(In the photo, Elva is wearing a red, white and black striped sweater; she is seated and is the first from the left)

loans.use: vehicle maintenance

loans.name: María Cumanda

texts.es:
La Señora María O. es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive por el sector de Totoracocha en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad cuenta con la belleza de sus paisajes que se mezclan entre lo colonial y lo moderno, sus 4 ríos que la bañan hacen de esta una ciudad única, su gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.
 
La Señora María tiene 58 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, e casados y viven independientes. Su esposo no se encuentra en el país, ha migrado en busca de mejores oportunidades de trabajo, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Doña María tiene un local en donde se dedica a la venta de bisutería, esta actividad la desempeña hace 5 años, labora desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche  de lunes a sábados.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 11 años y los créditos le han beneficiado mucho en su negocio y hogar, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de más mercadería para su negocio. Su meta es  prosperar mucho más en su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora María O. is a member of the Nuevos Horizontes (New Horizons) Community Bank. She lives in the Totoracocha neighbourhood in the city of Cuenca which is renowned for beautiful scenery, its mixture of colonial and modern architecture, its unique four rivers, as well as its wonderful food beloved by locals and foreigners alike.

Sra. María is 58 years old, married, and has three adult children who are married and have left home. Her husband does not live in the country but has left in search of better work opportunities. She does not own her house but lives in rented accommodation.
 
María runs a stall selling jewelry, a business she began five years ago. She works from 9am to 7pm Monday through Saturday. She has been a member of her bank for eleven years, and the loans have helped her greatly with her business and home. The money from this loan will be used to buy more merchandise for her business. Her goal is to have a much more prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy jewelry

loans.name: Libia Mercedes

texts.es:
La Señora. Libia O. es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive por el sector de María Auxiliadora en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad cuenta con la belleza de sus paisajes que se mezclan entre lo colonial y lo moderno, sus 4 ríos que la bañan hacen de esta una ciudad única, su gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.
 
Doña Libia tiene 61 años, es casada y tiene 5 hijos que son mayores de edad,  tres de ellos son casados viven independientes, sus dos hijos solteros trabajan y ayudan en la economía de su hogar. Su esposo labora como empleado privado en una fábrica, no tiene casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

La Señora Libia se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar pero en sus tiempos libres se dedica a la venta de ropa, calzado, etc., recorrer la ciudad vendiendo sus productos hace 7 años, labora de lunes a sábados.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 12 años tiempo el cual los créditos le han permitido crecer poco a poco en su negocio, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de más ropa y calzado. Su meta es seguir trabajando y crecer mucho más en su negocio.
texts.en: Libia O. is a member of Nuevos Horizontes (New Horizons) community bank and lives in the María Auxiliadora sector of the city of Cuenca. It is a city known for its beautiful scenery, its mixture of colonial and modern traits, its four rivers that make it unique, and its gastronomy that captivates locals and foreigners alike. Libia is 61 years old, married and has five adult children, three who are married and live on their own and two who are single and work and help with household expenses. Her husband works as a private employee in a factory. They do not have their own home so they rent. Libia dedicates herself to taking care of the house but in her free time she makes a living selling clothing, footwear, etc. She has traveled the city selling her products for the past seven years, working from Monday through Saturday. She has belonged to her community bank for 12 years, and the loans have helped her grow her business little by little. She plans to use this loan to invest in the purchase of more clothing and footwear. Her goal is to keep working and grow her business even more.

loans.use: Purchase clothing and footwear

loans.name: Carmen Victoria

texts.es:
La Señora. Carmen Vásquez es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive por la parroquia de Paccha, sector en donde su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura que es más para su autoconsumo, mucha de su gente encuentra en la ciudad un trabajo ayudando así a la economía de sus hogares.

Doña Carmen tiene 51 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 31, 28, 26, sus dos primeros hijos son casados y viven independientes pero recibe ayuda económica de un hijo casado, su ultimo hijo  estudia en la universidad. Su esposo se dedica a trabajar en la área de la construcción como albañil, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa.

La Señora Carmen se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar pero como pasa en casa aprovecha ese tiempo para dedicarse a la cría de animales como pollos, chanchos y ganado los mismos que vende en su propia comunidad.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 8 años y ahora su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en su alimento. Su meta es tener más animales para la venta.
texts.en: Carmen Vásquez is a member of the Nuevos Horizontes community bank and lives in the parish of Paccha, an area where the people make a living in agriculture and raising livestock more for their own consumption. Many people also find jobs in the city to help out their households financially. Carmen is 51 years old, married and has three children, ages 31, 28 and 26. Her first two children are married and live on their own, but she receives financial support from her son who is married. Her youngest son is studying at the university. Her husband makes a living as a construction worker in the area, and he helped build their home. Carmen dedicates herself to taking care of the home, but she takes advantage of her time by raising animals like chickens, pigs and cattle, which she sells in her community. She has belonged to her community bank for eight years and with this new loan she plans to invest in the purchase of chickens and animal feed. Her goal is to have more animals to sell.

loans.use: Purchase chickens and feed for animals.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: La Sra. Elvira S. es una persona muy trabajadora y respetuosa ella es divorciada, y tiene una hija que vive con ella, ella hace piñatas y arreglos florales para vender en su casa, la Sra.  Elvira necesita el dinero más que nada por que necesita surtir más mercancía para su negocio, ella desea en un futuro tener muy bien surtida y completa su negocio de piñatas, ella a base de su negocio se mantienen ella y su hija.
texts.en: Elvira S. is a very hard-working and respectful person. She is divorced and has a daughter who lives with her. She makes piñatas and floral arrangements that she sells out of her home. Elvira is requesting the loan because she needs to stock up on more supplies for her business. In the future, she wants to have a better-stocked and complete piñata business. The business helps her provide for herself and her daughter.

loans.use: Purchase more piñata supplies

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: La señora Angélica Ángel B. es de la comunidad de Amilcingo, Temoac, en el estado de Morelos, México. Ella tiene 39 años de edad, estudio hasta el 6º. Año de primaria tiene su certificado, ella es soltera  tiene 3 hijos Sheila tiene 17 años de edad estudia bachilleres, Roberto tiene 12 años de edad está estudiando la secundaria, Diana tiene 5 años de edad está en el Kínder, la señora Angélica tiene su negocio de venta de comida antojitos mexicanos y va a comprar con su préstamo mercancía refrescos artículos de abarrotes, materia prima verdura, cremería, dulces, y también va a arreglar su auto le va a hacer el servicio de afinación va a comprar unas refacciones y le va arreglar un golpe que le dieron a su auto su negocio se llama cafetería Angélica, ella ofrece a sus clientes picaditas, dobladas, tortas, tacos de arroz, dulces, refrescos, café. Ella inicio su negocio hace 10 años pidió permiso en la esculla Normal Rural de Amilcingo, aprendió viendo como preparan los alimentos con un crédito que le dieron compro su mercancía y su parrilla, el comal, su negocio está en la Escuela Normal rural de Amilcingo, se hace 15 minutos en su auto para trasladarse a su negocio. su negocio es importante porque de aquí tenemos todo la necesario para mantener a mis hijos y es un trabajo que valoro mucho, gracias a dios que tengo este trabajo,  todo me gusta de este negocio, estoy orgullosa de mi negocio porque es mío y no dependo de nadie, sus clientes son las señoritas estudiantes, los maestros atiende como a 100 clientes, su negocio es popular por el buen servicio atiende muy bien a sus clientes, los desafíos que enfrenta el negocio son el clima en tiempo de lluvias las ventas bajan, la competencia que enfrenta el negocio son que hay otro negocio que vende comida, las ganancias la utiliza para mantener a sus hijos, y para los gastos, su hija Sheila le ayuda en las tardes en el negocio a atender a los clientes, a preparar en la casa los alimentos para el otro día. Amilcingo es un pueblo chico, es bonito, elaboran los dulces, obleas, palanqueta de cacahuate, alegría, tamarindo, jamoncillo, también siembran cacahuate, maíz, amaranto, su negocio le ha ayudado en lo económica para la familia, para la alimentación para todos los gastos de la escuela de sus hijos, las mejoría que desearía hacer a su vivienda es ponerle las puertas y las ventanas, poner los vidrios y hacer una cisterna, sus planes y esperanzas para el futuro son que sus hijos estudien y que terminen su carrera, y lo piensa lograr invirtiendo el préstamo en el negocio para obtener ganancias. La señora Angélica está muy contenta con este préstamo que le dan y lo va a utilizar para seguir trabajado en la venta de comida. Ella quiere decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “Gracias por la confianza que me tienen y que sigan ayudando a más personas con sus préstamos”
texts.en: Angélica Ángel B. is from the community of Amilcingo, Temoac, in the state of Morelos, México. She is 39 years old and has a sixth-grade education. She is single and has three children: Sheila, 17, who is in baccalaureate studies; Roberto, 12, who is in middle school; Diana, 5, who is in kindergarten. Angélica has a business selling Mexican food, and with the loan she plans to purchase refreshments, grocery items, ingredients, vegetables and desserts for her business. She also plans to service her car and buy some parts and fix some damage to it. Her business is called Cafetería Angélica. She offers typical regional dishes to customers such as tortas and tacos, as well as sweets, coffee and refreshments. She started her business 10 years old, getting permission to sell food in Normal Rural school in Amilcingo. She learned by watching how they prepared the food, and with her first loan she purchased supplies, a grill and a griddle. Her business still is in the school, which takes her about 15 minutes to travel to. Her business is important because it provides her with everything she needs to take care of her children, and it's a job she values a lot. She thanks God for the job, and she likes everything about it. She is very proud of her business because it is hers and she doesn't depend on anyone.
